**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 246 2.0 You are adept at living in the wilderness, foraging for food and building shelter, and with training you discover the secrets of tracking and hiding your trail. Survival Untrained General Actions - [Subsist](/Skills.aspx?ID=25&General=true) in the wild by foraging for food and building shelter. Item Bonuses for Survival
Item Bonus Level Category Consumable Note
[Staff of Providence](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3422) +1 0 [Staves](/equipment/staves) No Survival checks to Sense Direction or Subsist
[Emperor's Peak Quartz Bracelet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3766) +1 3 [Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items) No Item bonus to Survival checks to Sense Direction. +3 if in mountainous terrain
[Emperor's Peak Quartz Bracelet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3766) +1 3 [Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items) No Item bonus to Survival checks to Subsist. +3 if in mountainous terrain
[Eyes Of The Moonwarden](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3673) +1 9 [Other Worn Items](/equipment/worn-items/other-worn-items) No item bonus to Survival checks
[Needle of Undeath](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3687) +2 10 [Held Items](/equipment/held-items) No item bonus to sense direction when using the stars to orient themself
